name: UIActivityViewController
desc: A view controller that you use to offer standard services from your app.

items.name: init(activityItems: [Any], applicationActivities: [UIActivity]?)
items.desc: Initializes a new activity view controller object that acts on the specified data.

items.name: init(activityItemsConfiguration: UIActivityItemsConfigurationReading)
items.desc: Initializes a new activity view controller object that acts on the specified configuration.

items.name: class UIActivityItemsConfiguration
items.desc: A configuration that allows a responder to export data through a variety of interactions.

items.name: protocol UIActivityItemsConfigurationReading
items.desc: A set of methods adopted by an object so that the object can act as an activity items configuration.

items.name: var completionWithItemsHandler: UIActivityViewController.CompletionWithItemsHandler?
items.desc: The completion handler to execute after the activity view controller is dismissed.

items.name: typealias UIActivityViewController.CompletionWithItemsHandler
items.desc: A completion handler to execute after the activity view controller is dismissed.

items.name: var excludedActivityTypes: [UIActivity.ActivityType]?
items.desc: The list of services that should not be displayed.

items.name: typealias UIActivityViewController.CompletionHandler
items.desc: A completion handler to execute after the activity view controller is dismissed.
